instruction: Given a situation and action, explain the consequences in the long-term.
input:
Situation: A student skips classes to play video games
Action: The student continues to skip classes
output: If the student continues to skip classes, they will likely fall behind in their studies and may even fail their classes. This can lead to them not being able to graduate, or having to retake their classes later on. It can also negatively impact their future potential job prospects.
